"Now, at this point, the Valentine is co:
"Coming to this point, I have one thing that worries me.
That is the small number of types of chocolate!
I have confidence in the taste and the decorations,
but once there is only one type of chocolate, there
will be limits in the appealing power.
As such, I have also included a sensational idea,
to use the flames from the Vol Dragon to roast the
chocolate! I think this is somewhat good, isn't it?
How is it?! How is it?!
*Target Vol Dragon of Lv.1 or higher"
"今ここに、バレンタインは完成す！"

"ここにきて、悩み事が一つ出てきたのよね。
それは、チョコレートの種類の少なさ！
味や飾り付けには自信があるんだけど
種類が一つだと、訴求力にも限界があるの。
でね、センセーショナルなアイデアも含めて
ヴォル・ドラゴンの炎で焼チョコ！　なんて
いいんじゃないかなって思うんだけど
どうかなっ！　……どうかなっ！
※Lv.1～のヴォル・ドラゴンが対象"
